\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{ambeth.merge.datachanges.delete.alternateids}
\label{configuration:AmbethMergeDatachangesDeleteAlternateids}
\ClearAPI
If true datachanges for deletes are generated for every ID (PrimaryKeys and AlternateKeys). Valid values are "true" and "false".

%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{com.koch.ambeth.merge.config.MergeConfigurationConstants.DeleteDataChangesByAlternateIds}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{ambeth.merge.datachanges.delete.alternateids}}]
ambeth.merge.datachanges.delete.alternateids=false
\end{lstlisting}
